OpenCV_to_RAPID.py¶

create_robtarget(gripper_height, gripper_rot, cam_pos, image, puck, cam_comp=False)¶

Complete a series of transformations to finally create a robtarget of the puck’s position from an image. These transformations are based on the setup at the University of Stavanger, and with a specific RobotStudio setup (in regards to coordinate systems). This Pack and Go file includes this setup.

ABB-Robot-Machine-Vision
